Post.title: docker
Post._content: Docker Go Apache2.0 Docker Linux iPhone app, ## dockerdockerdocker dockerdockerInfrastructure as code docker docker dockerCP ## docker ### Docker 20246dockerDocker Docker Github Action/Release [](https://github.com/tech-shrimp/me) BYoutube ``` Bash Linux sudo curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com| bash -s docker --mirror Aliyun # sudo curl -fsSL https://github.com/tech-shrimp/docker_installer/releases/download/latest/linux.sh| bash -s docker --mirror Aliyun # sudo curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/tech-shrimp/docker_installer/releases/download/latest/linux.sh| bash -s docker --mirror Aliyun # 2 githubgitee sudo service docker start #Docker ``` ### Centosdocker CentOS 7 CentOS Extras overlay2 Dockerdockerdocker-engine ``` Bash centOS sudo yum remove docker \ docker-client \ docker-client-latest \ docker-common \ docker-latest \ docker-latest-logrotate \ docker-logrotate \ docker-engine ``` docker/var/lib/docker/ #### 1.() ``` Bash centOS curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sudo sh get-docker.sh ``` 2.() 2.1docker ``` Bash centOS sudo yum install -y yum-utils \ device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 sudo yum-config-manager \ --add-repo \ https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo ``` 2.2docker CE ``` Bash centOS sudo yum install docker-ce docker-ce-cli container.io # Docker CE yum list docker-ce --showduplicates | sort -r sudo yum install docker-ce- docker-ce-cli- container.io #-18.09.618.06.2.ce ``` 3.RPM 3.1Docker https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/7/x86_64/stable/Packages/ ``` Bash centOS sudo yum install /path/to/package.rpm # /path/to/package.rpm,rpm sudo systemctl start docker # Docker sudo docker run hello-world # ``` : [Centosdocker](https://www.coonote.com/docker/centos-install-docker.html) ### Ubuntudocker Docker 64Ubuntu Ubuntu 3.103.10 ``` Bash Ubuntu uname -r 3.11.0-15-generic ``` ``` Bash Ubuntu which wget # wget sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install wget # wget wget -qO- https://get.docker.com/ | sh # Docker sudo docker run hello-world # Docker # ``` : [Ubuntudocker](https://www.coonote.com/docker/ubuntu-install-docker.html) ### Macosdocker Homebrew Cask Docker for Mac ``` Bash Macos brew cask install docker ``` Docker app Next macOS Docker : [Macosadocker](https://www.coonote.com/docker/macos-intall-docker.html) ## docker ### Pull #### github ActionDocker DockerHub, gcr.io, k8s.io, ghcr.io 40GB : [Github](https://github.com/tech-shrimp/docker_image_pusher) #### , | | | | | :--------- | :------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------- | | 1Panel | https://github.com/1Panel-dev/1Panel/ | https://docker.1panel.live | | Daocloud | https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror | https://docker.m.daocloud.io | | | https://github.com/TheTNB/panel | https://hub.rat.dev | linux ``` bash Linux sudo vi /etc/docker/daemon.json #/daemon { "registry-mirrors": [ "https://docker.m.daocloud.io", "https://docker.1panel.live", "https://hub.rat.dev" ] } # viesc:wq nanoctrl+x sudo service docker restart # docker ``` #### Github Actiondocker https://github.com/wukongdaily/DockerTarBuilder #### ``` bash docker bash -c "$(curl -sSLf https://xy.ggbond.org/xy/docker_pull.sh)" -s ``` #### Cloudflare worker https://github.com/cmliu/CF-Workers-docker.io #### https://docker.fxxk.dedyn.io/ : [Github Action](https://github.com/tech-shrimp/docker_installer?tab=readme-ov-file) ### ## Docker Dockerfile Dockerfile Dockerfile Docker PythonNodeNginx Dockerfile ``` Dockerfile # 1. FROM [:tag] # 2. WORKDIR /app # 3. COPY .. # 4. RUN RUN # 5. ENV = # 6. CMD ["",""] # 7. EXPOSE ``` + | | | | |----------|-------------------------------|----------------------------------| | FROM | FROM node:18 | | | WORKDIR | WORKDIR /app | cd | | COPY | COPY . . | | | RUN | RUN npm install | | | CMD | CMD ["npm", "start"] | | | EXPOSE | EXPOSE 3000 | | Flask Web App ``` bash my-flask-app/ app.py requirements.txt Dockerfile ``` app.py ``` python from flask import Flask app = Flask(__name__) @app.route("/") def home(): return "Hello,Docker!" if __name__ == "__main__": app.run(host="0.0.0.0",port=5000) ``` requirements.txt ``` bash flask ``` Dockerfile ``` Dockerfile FROM python:3.9-slim WORKDIR /app COPY .. RUN pip install -r requirements.txt EXPOSE 5000 CMD ["python","app.py"] ``` ``` bash docker build -t my-flask-app . docker run -d -p 5000:5000 my-flask-app ``` http://localhost:5000 | | | |----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------| | | CMD | | | `-slim``-alpine` | | | COPY `.dockerignore` | | | `.dockerignore` `node_modules` | Dockerfile ``` Dockerfile # FROM node:18 as build WORKDIR /app COPY .. RUN nom install && npm run build # nginx FROM nginx COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html # ENV PORT=8080 ``` FROM WORKDIR COPY RUN CMD ## Docker Compose Docker Compose docker-compose.yml webdbredis docker-compose up ```Yaml version: '3' #Compose,33.8 services: # 1: image: buld ports: - "" volumes: - "" environment: - "=" depends_on: - 2: .... ``` Nginx ```Yaml my-compose-project/ docker-compose.yml html/ index.html nginx.conf ``` docker-compose.yml ```Yaml version: '3' services: web: image: nginx ports: - "8080:80" volumes: - ./html:/usr/share/nginx/html:ro - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro ``` 8080 80 ./html nginx nginx ```bash Ubuntu docker-compose up -d ``` ```bash Ubuntu docker-compose down -v ``` Node.js + MongoDB ```Yaml version: '3' services: app: build: . ports: - "3000:3000" environment: - MONGO_URL=mongodb://mongo:27017/mydb depends_on: - mongo mongo: image: mongo ports: - "27017:27017" ``` app Dockerfile Mongo mongo | | | |----------------|---------------------------------------------------| | image: | | | build: | Dockerfile | | ports: | : | | volumes: | : | | environment: | | | depends_on: | | | restart: | alwayson-failure | | networks: | | ```bash Ubuntu # docker-compose up -d # docker-compose down # docker-compose logs # docker-compose ps # docker-compose exec bash ```

Post.title: Prometheus+Grafana
Post._content:
## 
####  Prometheus 

Prometheus +

 
		 CPU 
		
		 PromQL 
		 CPU 5 90%

 

####  Grafana 

Grafana 

 
		 Prometheus
		
		
		Grafana  Prometheus 

  +  + 

## 
####  Node Exporter
Node ExporterPrometheusCPU

``` bash Ubuntu
ssh root@ip

sudo useradd --no-create-home --shell /bin/false node_exporter
# node_exporter()

wget https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter/releases/download/v1.7.0/node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo cp node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64/node_exporter /usr/local/bin/
# node_exporter

sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/node_exporter.service
# systemd
```

``` bash Ubuntu
[Unit]
Description=Node Exporter
After=network.target

[Service]
User=node_exporter
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/node_exporter #

[Install]
WantedBy=default.target
```

``` bash Ubuntu
sudo systemctl daemon-reexec
sudo systemctl start node_exporter
sudo systemctl enable node_exporter
```


http://IP:9100/metrics


####  Prometheus
Prometheus
``` bash Ubuntu
wget https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/releases/download/v2.50.0/prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz # 
cd prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64 
# .yml

nano prometheus.yml # prometheus
```

``` bash Ubuntu
global:         # 
  scrape_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'node_exporter'
    static_configs: #  
      - targets: ['localhost:9100'] 

  - job_name: 'website_http_check'
    metrics_path: /probe
    params:
      module: [http_2xx]
    static_configs:
      - targets:
          - http://IP
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [__address__]
        target_label: __param_target
      - source_labels: [__param_target]
        target_label: instance
      - target_label: __address__
        replacement: localhost:9115  # blackbox_exporter 
```

####  Blackbox Exporter()
``` bash Ubuntu
wget https://github.com/prometheus/blackbox_exporter/releases/download/v0.25.0/blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
cd blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64 
./blackbox_exporter     # 
# systemdnode_exporter
```

####  prometheus
``` bash Ubuntu
./prometheus --config.file=prometheus.yml
```

http://IP:9090 Prometheus  Web 

####   Grafana
``` bash
sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https software-properties-common
# 
 
sudo apt-get install -y wget
wget -q -O - https://packages.grafana.com/gpg.key | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb https://packages.grafana.com/oss/deb stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/grafana.list
sudo apt-get update
# grafana

sudo apt-get install grafana
sudo systemctl start grafana-server
sudo systemctl enable grafana-server
# grafana
```
grafana
 http://IP:3000
admin
admin  

####   Grafana
 Prometheus http://localhost:9090
 Dashboard 
Node Exporter ID 1860
Blackbox  ID 7587



## 

### grafana
Grafana
1. grafana/opt/bitnami/grafana/conf/defaults.ini
                          /usr/share/grafana/conf/defaults.ini
2. default_languageen-USzh-Hansgrafana
3. 
4. 
``` bash
systemctl restart grafana-server
```

### 
####   Prometheus 
Prometheus  PromQL 
1. 
 Prometheus  alert.rules 
``` bash Ubuntu
nano /etc/prometheus/alert.rules 
# prometheus/
```
2. 
``` bash Yaml
groups:
  - name: node_alerts
    rules:
    - alert: HighCPUUsage 
      expr: 100 * (1 - avg by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m]))) > 80
      for: 5m
      labels:
        severity: critical
      annotations:
        summary: "CPU usage is above 80% on {{ $labels.instance }}"
        description: "CPU usage is above 80% for 5 minutes on {{ $labels.instance }}."
        
    - alert: HighLoadAverage
      expr: node_load1 > 2
      for: 5m
      labels:
        severity: critical
      annotations:
        summary: "High load average on {{ $labels.instance }}"
        description: "The 1-minute load average is above 2 on {{ $labels.instance }}."
```
HighCPUUsage CPU  80%  5 
HighLoadAverage 1  2 
2.  Prometheus 
 Prometheus  prometheus.yml
``` bash Ubuntu
rule_files:
  - "/etc/prometheus/alert.rules"
```
3.  Prometheus

 Prometheus 
``` bash
sudo systemctl restart prometheus
```
####   Grafana 

 Prometheus  Grafana 

1. 

 Grafana  Slack 


	1.	 Grafana UI Alerting > Notification channels
	2.	 Add channel
	3.	 Email
		Email Address
		SMTP SMTP  Gmail  SMTP

/Slack 

 Slack  Webhook Webhook URL

2. 

 Grafana  Dashboard
	1.	 Alert 
	2.	
		
		 5 
	3.	 Notifications  Email

3. 

 Save Grafana 
####  
1.  Grafana  SMTP  smtp Gmail
  
|          |  Gmail               |
|----------------|-------------------------------------|
| SMTP  | smtp.gmail.com                      |
|          | 587 (TLS) / 465 (SSL)               |
|        | yourname@gmail.com                  |
|    | Gmail          |
|      |        |

1.  Grafana  grafana.ini

``` bash
nano /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
```

``` bash ini
#################################### SMTP / Emailing ##########################
[smtp]
enabled = true
host = smtp.gmail.com:587
user = yourname@gmail.com
password = your_app_password   ; # Gmail 
;cert_file =
;key_file =
skip_verify = false
from_address = yourname@gmail.com
from_name = Grafana Monitor

[emails]
;welcome_email_on_sign_up = false
```
 QQ 163  host
3.   Gmail 
	1.	 Gmail 
	2.	 https://myaccount.google.com/security
	3.	 
	4.	 Grafana 
	5.	 password 
4.  Grafana 
 Grafana 
``` bash
sudo systemctl restart grafana-server
```
1.  Grafana 
	1.	 Grafana   Alerting  Contact points
	2.	 Email 
	3.	
	4.	 Send test notification
Post.raw:
---
title: Prometheus+Grafana
date: 2025-03-30 13:43:43
tags: [,]
categories: [,,Prometheus+Grafana]
cover: /images/.png
---
## 
####  Prometheus

## 
####  Node Exporter
Node ExporterPrometheusCPU

``` bash Ubuntu
ssh root@ip

sudo useradd --no-create-home --shell /bin/false node_exporter
# node_exporter()

wget https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter/releases/download/v1.7.0/node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo cp node_exporter-1.7.0.linux-amd64/node_exporter /usr/local/bin/
# node_exporter

sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/node_exporter.service
# systemd
```

``` bash Ubuntu
[Unit]
Description=Node Exporter
After=network.target

[Service]
User=node_exporter
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/node_exporter #

[Install]
WantedBy=default.target
```

``` bash Ubuntu
sudo systemctl daemon-reexec
sudo systemctl start node_exporter
sudo systemctl enable node_exporter
```


http://IP:9100/metrics


####  Prometheus
Prometheus
``` bash Ubuntu
wget https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/releases/download/v2.50.0/prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz # 
cd prometheus-2.50.0.linux-amd64 
# .yml

nano prometheus.yml # prometheus
```

``` bash Ubuntu
global:         # 
  scrape_interval: 15s

scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'node_exporter'
    static_configs: #  
      - targets: ['localhost:9100'] 

  - job_name: 'website_http_check'
    metrics_path: /probe
    params:
      module: [http_2xx]
    static_configs:
      - targets:
          - http://IP
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [__address__]
        target_label: __param_target
      - source_labels: [__param_target]
        target_label: instance
      - target_label: __address__
        replacement: localhost:9115  # blackbox_exporter 
```

####  Blackbox Exporter()
``` bash Ubuntu
wget https://github.com/prometheus/blackbox_exporter/releases/download/v0.25.0/blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar xvf blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz
cd blackbox_exporter-0.25.0.linux-amd64 
./blackbox_exporter     # 
# systemdnode_exporter
```

``` bash Ubuntu
./prometheus --config.file=prometheus.yml
```

####   Grafana
``` bash
sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https software-properties-common
# 
 
sudo apt-get install -y wget
wget -q -O - https://packages.grafana.com/gpg.key | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb https://packages.grafana.com/oss/deb stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/grafana.list
sudo apt-get update
# grafana

sudo apt-get install grafana
sudo systemctl start grafana-server
sudo systemctl enable grafana-server
# grafana
```

####   Prometheus 
Prometheus  PromQL 
1. 
 Prometheus  alert.rules 
``` bash Ubuntu
nano /etc/prometheus/alert.rules 
# prometheus/
```
2. 
``` bash Yaml
groups:
  - name: node_alerts
    rules:
    - alert: HighCPUUsage 
      expr: 100 * (1 - avg by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m]))) > 80
      for: 5m
      labels:
        severity: critical
      annotations:
        summary: "CPU usage is above 80% on {{ $labels.instance }}"
        description: "CPU usage is above 80% for 5 minutes on {{ $labels.instance }}."
        
    - alert: HighLoadAverage
      expr: node_load1 > 2
      for: 5m
      labels:
        severity: critical
      annotations:
        summary: "High load average on {{ $labels.instance }}"
        description: "The 1-minute load average is above 2 on {{ $labels.instance }}."
```
HighCPUUsage CPU  80%  5 
HighLoadAverage 1  2 
2.  Prometheus 
 Prometheus  prometheus.yml
``` bash Ubuntu
rule_files:
  - "/etc/prometheus/alert.rules"
```

